Top March Stories: Will GDPR Make Machine Learning Illegal?

Previous post
Next post

 
 
Tags: Top stories

Also: The Two Sides of Getting a Job as a Data Scientist; 5 Things You Need to Know about Big Data.


By Gregory Piatetsky, KDnuggets.
Here are the most popular posts in KDnuggets in March, based on the number of unique page views (UPV), the available share counts from Facebook, Twitter, and Addthis (LinkedIn alas has removed the share counts on Feb 7, 2018)

Most Viewed - Gold Badges (>12,000 UPV)

  1. Will GDPR Make Machine Learning Illegal?, by Gregory Piatetsky


Most Viewed - Silver Badges (> 5,000 UPV)

  1. The Two Sides of Getting a Job as a Data Scientist, by Favio Vazquez
  2. Top 5 Best Jupyter Notebook Extensions, by Eliot Andres
  3. Your free 70-page guide to a career in data science, by Springboard (*)
  4. Time Series for Dummies - The 3 Step Process, by Chris St. Jeor & Sean Ankenbruck
  5. Introduction to Markov Chains, by Devin Soni
  6. 5 Things to Know About Machine Learning, by Matthew Mayo
  7. Top 12 Essential Command Line Tools for Data Scientists, by Matthew Mayo






Most Shared - Gold Badges (>600 shares)

  1. Will GDPR Make Machine Learning Illegal?, by Gregory Piatetsky
  2. 5 Things You Need to Know about Big Data, by Dan Clark
  3. 18 Inspiring Women In AI, Big Data, Data Science, Machine Learning, by Gregory Piatetsky (*)


Most Shared - Silver Badges (>300 shares)

  1. 5 Things to Know About Machine Learning, by Matthew Mayo
  2. Time Series for Dummies - The 3 Step Process, by Chris St. Jeor & Sean Ankenbruck
  3. 5 Things You Need to Know about Sentiment Analysis and Classification, by Symeon Symeonidis
  4. Introduction to Markov Chains, by Devin Soni
  5. Introduction to Optimization with Genetic Algorithm, by Ahmed Gad (*)
  6. Text Data Preprocessing: A Walkthrough in Python, by Matthew Mayo
  7. How data science can improve retail, by Konrad Pabianczyk (*)
  8. Top 5 Best Jupyter Notebook Extensions, by Eliot Andres
  9. Data Science in Fashion, by Preet Gandhi (*)


(*) indicates that badge added or upgraded based on these monthly results.

Most Shareable (Viral) Blogs

Among the top blogs, here are the 5 blogs with the highest ratio of shares/unique views, which suggests that people who read it really liked it.
  1. The Current Hype Cycle in Artificial Intelligence, by Alok Aggarwal
  2. 18 Inspiring Women In AI, Big Data, Data Science, Machine Learning, by Gregory Piatetsky
  3. 5 Things You Need to Know about Big Data, by Dan Clark
  4. 5 Things You Need to Know about Sentiment Analysis and Classification, by Symeon Symeonidis
  5. How data science can improve retail, by Konrad Pabianczyk
